rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A small foyer with storage for shoes and coats.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious open plan area combining a minimalist living room adjacent to the dining space. It opens to an adjoining covered patio for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with built-in storage and a walk-in closet. The room is designed in a minimalist style with neutral colors.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact bedroom that maintains minimalistic design and sufficient storage for guests.

rooms.name: Children's Room
rooms.description: A light-filled room with ample space for play and study. Minimalistic decor with built-in furniture where possible.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An open kitchen layout that is integrated into the living-dining area to promote family interactions. Equipped with modern fixtures and a small pantry.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space located in a quiet area of the ground floor. Soundproofed with state-of-the-art audio-visual equipment and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Balcony / Patio
rooms.description: A covered balcony area attached to the living-dining zone offering views and fresh air. Complies with Vastu guidelines for natural light.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small room designated for laundry and storage of cleaning supplies. Minimalist in design to maintain the overall aesthetic.
